price: Kuma aka ce: "Yã ƙasa! Ki haɗiye ruwanki, kuma yã sama! Ki kãme."Kuma aka faƙar da ruwan kuma aka hukunta al'amarin, kuma Jirgin ya daidaita a kan Jũdiyyi*, kuma aka ce: "Nĩsa ya tabbata ga mutãne Azzãlumai."
arabic: وَقِيلَ يَٰٓأَرۡضُ ٱبۡلَعِي مَآءَكِ وَيَٰسَمَآءُ أَقۡلِعِي وَغِيضَ ٱلۡمَآءُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَٱسۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡجُودِيِّۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Judiyyu sũnan wani dũtse ne a cikin Jazĩra. Jirgin Nũhu ya zauna a kansa, har mutãnen farko na wannan al'umma sun gan shi. Sa'an nan ya halaka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqīla yāarḍu ib'laʿī māaki wayāsamāu aqliʿī waghīḍa al-māu waquḍiya al-amru wa-is'tawat ʿalā al-jūdiyi waqīla buʿ'dan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
